articles.author: Oussama Aamari - Morocco World News
articles.title: Experts Call for Carefulness, Not Panic Over Monkeypox - Morocco World News
articles.description: With the current spread of the monkeypox virus in Europe, some are worried and bracing themselves for more lockdowns and health measures as the world recovers from the COVID-19 pandemic which crippled the global economy for two years.

articles.author: Zia Weise
articles.title: Shell consultant quits, says company causes ‘extreme harm’ to planet - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Oil giant’s expansion plan prompted resignation email accusing firm of dismissing climate risks.
articles.content:
A Shell consultant resigned Monday with a searing email accusing the oil giant of failing on a massive planetary scale to limit climate risks.

articles.title: Explainer: How concerned should we be about monkeypox? - KSL.com
